//1: describes your app and its dependencies
//3: updating this file will download and update your packages
name: authzen-xacml-json-proxy
description: This project contains a Node.JS app based on Typescript and Express. It exposes an endpoint that conforms to the OpenID AuthZEN specification, processes the request, converts it to a XACML/JSON request, sends it to a compatible PDP, and processes the response it receives back.
